popover.primary: A mastery path focused on dealing damage to a single, far-away enemy.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting in melee combat.
popover.secondary: Sword counts 100% of its dps towards abilities.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting multiple enemies at medium range.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

data.name: Acid Arrow
data.description: An attack which deals (25 + 6 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.5 dps) physical damage and causes your target to take a (120 + 21.75 * rank) ability penalty to armor and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Assault Stance
data.note: Can only have one active stance.
data.description:
A close-combat stance which causes you to gain a 120 unique bonus to Strength and Weaponskill, and a unique bonus to Armor equal to the same amount that you receive from items.

While in Assault Stance your ranged prowess item stats will count towards your melee prowess in a 1 to 1 conversion respectively. Parry chance is increased by 10%, Autoattack damage is increased by 65%. Additionally you have a 25% chance on melee attacks to increase your Autoattack speed by 33%.

data.name: Barrage
data.description: Deals (32 + 7.4 * rank) + (0.25 bal) + (1.5 dps) physical damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Blood-Soaked War
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will instantly regain 321 health.

data.name: Broadhead Arrow
data.description: An Ailment which deals (96.67 + 55/3 * rank) + (0.9 bal) + (3.5 dps) physical damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Brutal Assault
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Requires Scout or Assault Stance
data.description:
Deals (56 + 8 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.4 dps) physical damage to your target, and makes monsters hate you less than normal. Only usable when you are behind the target.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack may be used from any position.

data.name: Bullseye
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit is increased by 20% for 5 seconds, but you also become 10% more vulnerable to being critically hit.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Counterstrike
data.description: A quick strike which deals (21.67 + 7/3 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.4 dps) damage to your target and interrupts any ability that they were building up.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Rebounds
data.description: Distracting Shot will now also affect any other enemies within 20 feet of your initial target.

data.name: Distracting Shot
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Draw Blood
data.description: An Ailment which deals (56 + 12 * rank) + (0.6 bal) + (2.4 dps) physical damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Eagle Eye
data.description: A well aimed arrow that deals (91 + 8.5 * rank) + (0.4 bal) + (2.0 dps) physical damage.

data.name: Enchanted Arrows
data.description: All attacks in the Path of the Scout will now inflict corporeal damage, and Acid Arrow will now cause your target to take a (X * rank) ability penalty to corporeal resistance

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Exploit Weakness
data.description: A Crippling attack which deals (40 + 6.6 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.4 dps) physical damage and knocks down your target for 3 seconds.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Eye Shot
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals X damage and causes your target to take a (2* rank) ability penalty to Initiative for 20 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move. 3 Second knockdown.

data.name: Fell The Weak
data.description: Deals (97 + 19 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (3.5 dps) physical damage if your target is below 30% hit points, or (33.33 + 20/3 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.5 dps) physical damage otherwise.

data.name: Festering Arrow
data.description: Deals (38 + 19.5 * rank) + (0.7875 bal) corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Flame Arrow
data.note: Requires Scout Stance or Skirmish Stance
data.description: An Ailment which deals (25 + 4 * rank) + (0.2 bal) elemental damage to your target and then explodes, dealing an additional (309 + 5.5 * rank) + (0.3 bal) elemental damage over 9 seconds to the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Flanking Shot
data.note:
Requires Skirmish Stance
Target must be facing away from you
data.description: Deals (50 + 8 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.5 dps) physical damage to your target. Only usable from behind the target. The critical chance of the ability is increased by the percentage of life lost on the enemy target.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Glass Arrow
data.description: Deals (33 + 4 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (2.0 dps) physical damage to your target and reduces range on their abilities to 75% for the next 3 seconds.

data.name: Grim Slash
data.description: Deals (8 + 5 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.8 dps) physical damage to your target.

data.name: Guerrilla Training
data.description: Reduces the action point costs of all abilities within the Path Of The Scout by 35%.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Hunter's Fervor
data.description: An inspired ferver fills your group, increasing AP regeneration by 20% for 15 seconds to all groupmates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Instill Fear
data.description: You deal 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggers the target for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Instinctive Aim
data.description: Gives a 120 unique bonus to Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weaponskill, and a 120 unique penalty to toughness.

data.name: Keen Arrowheads
data.description: Increases the durations of Broadhead Arrows to 21 seconds, Takedown to 15 seconds, and Eye Shot to 25 seconds.

data.name: Leading Shots
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a ranged attack, the chance to critically hit will be increased by 8% for 10 seconds for group members within 100 feet, but this will not affect you.

data.name: Lileath's Arrow
data.description: A piercing arrow which deals (24 + 8 * rank) + (0.2375 bal) + (2.0 dps) physical damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Lileath's Forgiveness
data.description: Removes all Hexes, Curses, Cripples, and Ailments from you. You regain 250 Action Points.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Gives a 160 unique bonus to Ballistic Skill.

data.name: Merciless Soldier
data.description: Increases the critical damage of your direct damage Path of Assault abilities by 50% and the critical chance of Swift Strikes and Draw Blood by 25%.

data.name: No Quarter
data.description: Eagle's Eye now builds up 1 seconds faster, but the cost is increased by 13 Action Points.

data.name: No Respite
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Opportunistic Strike
data.description: A Crippling attack that deals (8 + 5 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.8 dps) damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Ambush
data.description: Hidden Allies come to your aid and launch an attack that deals 900 damage over 9 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet, and snares the targets by 60%.

data.name: Penetrating Arrow
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away, and an additional 1200 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to block, dodge, and parry will be reduced by 15% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Powerful Draw
data.description: Increases the maximum range of all Path Of The Skirmisher attacks by 50%.

data.name: Rain of Steel
data.description: You repeatedly shoot arrows at the ground for 10 seconds, dealing 219 damage every second to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.

data.name: Rapid Fire
data.description:
You move with blinding speed as you quickly fire several shots at your target, dealing (12.5 + 2.5 * rank) + (0.1 bal) + (0.75 dps) physical damage to the enemy twice per second for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
If you are Vengeful, then the shots will deal 10% more damage.

data.name: Replenishing Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 Action Points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Scout Stance
data.note: Can only have one stance active.
data.description: A long-distance bow stance that gives a 80 unique bonus to Ballistic Skill and Initiative and the range of your bow attacks by 10%.

data.name: Shadow Sting
data.description: An Ailment which deals (84 + 12 * rank) + (0.6 bal) + (2.0 dps) damage to your target over 9 seconds and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker. Only usable on a target that is already Ailing.

data.name: Shadow Step
data.description: You merge with the shadows and appear on your target within the blink of an eye. For the next 10 seconds your defences will be increased.

data.name: Sinister Assault
data.description: Brutal Assault will now bypass all of the target's armor.

data.name: Skirmish Stance
data.note: Can only have one stance active.
data.description: A close-range bow stance that gives a 80 unique bonus to Toughness and the chance that your bow attacks will critically hit by 5%. You gain the ability to autoattack while moving while in this stance.

data.name: Smoldering Arrows
data.description: Flame Arrow's damage over time is increased to (75 + 13.2 * rank) + (0.3 bal) elemental damage.

data.name: Spiral-Fletched Arrow
data.description: Deals (26 + 5 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.5 dps) physical damage to your target. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Split Arrows
data.description: Spiral-Fletched Arrow now hits all enemies within 20 feet of your initial target, but does 30% less damage.

data.name: Steady Aim
data.description: For the next 6 seconds, all of your abilities that do damage will have a 50% higher chance to critically hit, but will take an additional 1.5 seconds to build up.

data.name: Sweeping Slash
data.description: Deals (30 + 6 * rank) + (0.2 bal) + (1.4 dps) physical damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to 25 feet away.

data.name: Swift Strikes
data.description: You unleash a punishing series of attacks on your enemy for up to 3 seconds, striking them twice per second and dealing (59 + 2 * rank) + (0.1 bal) + (0.8 dps)physical damage per hit. If the target is building up an ability, then your strikes will deal (22 + 4 * rank) + (0.1 bal) + (0.8 dps) physical damage instead.This ability will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Takedown
data.description: An Ailment which deals (25 + 5 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.5 dps) physical damage and snares your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Throat Shot
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals (33.33 + 20/3 * rank) + (0.3 bal) + (1.5 dps) damage and silences your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Vengeance of Nagarythe
data.description: You are filled with a desire for vengeance, increasing all damage you deal by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Whirling Pin
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet become snared, reducing movement speed by 40% for the next 10 seconds. You are knocked back away from your enemies.

data.name: Whirling Rage
data.description: Deals (267 + 53.33 * assault rank) damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Wrist Slash
data.description: Grim Slash will now reduce your enemy's Weapon Skill by 120 and Initiative by 80 for 20 seconds, and increase your Weapon Skill and Initiative by the same amount.

data.name: Crosscut
data.description: You unleash two swift blows upon your enemy that deal X Spirit damage each, causing them to be 10% more likely to be critically hit by others for 10 seconds.
